law.catch_line: After termination of the guardianship under § 3-106 of this subtitle, the court shall distribute th...

text.section: After termination of the guardianship under § 3-106 of this subtitle, the court shall distribute the remaining property in accordance with Title 13 of the Estates and Trusts Article, and this subtitle.
The order of distribution shall be final and binding upon any person, including the absentee.
